divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing outside having a cigarette when i noticed out of the corner of my eye a flash in the sky, i disregarded it then it happened again and it was orange,at first i thought a meteor but it left no trail, then further south it pulsated a bright orange light and then again a white flash i lost sight of it due to trees, It was heading north to south
Summary: going from north to south, a bright white light flash then furhter down a bright orange light flash this continued until it was out of sight
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Westfield
There were no other sightings in Westfield on or around March 20th 2012
